13  package net.sf.oval.test.guard;
14  
15  import java.math.BigDecimal;
16  import java.util.Date;
17  
18  import junit.framework.TestCase;
19  import net.sf.oval.constraint.Assert;
20  import net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNull;
21  import net.sf.oval.exception.ConstraintsViolatedException;
22  import net.sf.oval.guard.Guard;
23  import net.sf.oval.guard.Guarded;
24  import net.sf.oval.guard.Post;
25  import net.sf.oval.guard.Pre;
26  
27  /**
28   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
29   */
30  public class PrePostRubyTest extends TestCase
31  {
32  	@Guarded
33  	public static class TestTransaction
34  	{
35  		@SuppressWarnings("unused")
36  		protected Date date;
37  
38  		@SuppressWarnings("unused")
39  		protected String description;
40  
41  		protected BigDecimal value;
42  
43  		public BigDecimal getValue()
44  		{
45  			return value;
46  		}
47  
48  		@Pre(expr = "_this.value!=nil && value2add!=nil && _args[0]!=nil", lang = "ruby", message = "PRE")
49  		public void increase1(@Assert(expr = "_value!=nil", lang = "ruby", message = "ASSERT")
50  		final BigDecimal value2add)
51  		{
52  			value = value.add(value2add);
53  		}
54  
55  		@Post(expr = "_this.value>_old['value']", old = "{ 'value' => _this.value }", lang = "ruby", message = "POST")
56  		public void increase2(@NotNull
57  		final BigDecimal value2add)
58  		{
59  			value = value.add(value2add);
60  		}
61  
62  		@Post(expr = "_this.value>_old['value']", old = "{ 'value' => _this.value }", lang = "ruby", message = "POST")
63  		public void increase2buggy(@NotNull
64  		final BigDecimal value2add)
65  		{
66  			value = value.subtract(value2add);
67  		}
68  	}
69  
70  	public void testPostRuby()
71  	{
72  		final Guard guard = new Guard();
73  		TestGuardAspect.aspectOf().setGuard(guard);
74  
75  		final TestTransaction t = new TestTransaction();
76  
77  		try
78  		{
79  			t.value = new BigDecimal(-2);
80  			t.increase2buggy(new BigDecimal(1));
81  			fail();
82  		}
83  		catch (final ConstraintsViolatedException ex)
84  		{
85  			assertEquals(ex.getConstraintViolations()[0].getMessage(), "POST");
86  		}
87  
88  		t.increase2(new BigDecimal(1));
89  	}
90  
91  	public void testPreRuby()
92  	{
93  		final Guard guard = new Guard();
94  		TestGuardAspect.aspectOf().setGuard(guard);
95  
96  		final TestTransaction t = new TestTransaction();
97  
98  		try
99  		{
100 			t.increase1(new BigDecimal(1));
101 			fail();
102 		}
103 		catch (final ConstraintsViolatedException ex)
104 		{
105 			assertEquals(ex.getConstraintViolations()[0].getMessage(), "PRE");
106 		}
107 
108 		try
109 		{
110 			t.value = new BigDecimal(2);
111 			t.increase1(null);
112 			fail();
113 		}
114 		catch (final ConstraintsViolatedException ex)
115 		{
116 			assertEquals(ex.getConstraintViolations()[0].getMessage(), "ASSERT");
117 		}
118 		try
119 		{
120 			t.increase1(new BigDecimal(1));
121 		}
122 		catch (final ConstraintsViolatedException ex)
123 		{
124 			System.out.println(ex.getConstraintViolations()[0].getMessage());
125 		}
126 	}
127 }
